remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的典型方案是在或的事件中调用它 。A typical scenario to use this method is to call it on the event of a or . > [!NOTE] > 仅当 的属性 设置为时，此方法才有效 `true` 。This method only works if the property of the is set to `true`. 如果 设置为，则会 `false` 引发异常，并且不会将树节点置于可编辑状态。If is set to `false`, an exception is thrown and the tree node will not be put into an editable state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户使用编辑 nonroot 树节点 。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时， 位于该位置的将确定并存储在一个名为的变量中 `mySelectedNode` 。When the user right-clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点，则会将其置于可编辑状态，从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中，多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符，或者字符串为空，则会向用户发送错误通知，并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 路径包含必须导航到的所有树节点的标签，从根树节点开始。The path consists of the labels of all the tree nodes that must be navigated to reach this tree node, starting at the root tree node. 节点标签由 包含此节点的控件的属性中指定的分隔符分隔 。The node labels are separated by the delimiter character specified in the property of the control that contains this node. 例如，如果将名为 "Location" 的树视图控件的分隔符字符设置为反斜杠字符， (\\) ，则 属性值为 "Country\Region\State"。For example, if the delimiter character of the tree view control named "Location" is set to the backslash character, (\\), the property value is "Country\Region\State". ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的 属性 ，并显示包含在中的子树节点的数目 。The following code example sets the property of a and displays the number of child tree nodes that are contained in the of the . 同时，还会显示树视图控件中的子树节点与树节点总数的百分比。The percentage of child tree node to total tree nodes in the tree view control is also displayed. 此示例要求具有 具有的 和具有 多个对象的控件， 这些 对象 (最好具有三个或更多的) 级别。This example requires that you have a with a , and a control with a that has several objects (preferably with three or more levels). remarks.format: ## Remarks 值是 存储在 分配给属性的中的的索引值 。The value is the index value of an stored in the assigned to the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性的默认值与 分配给的控件的属性相同 。The default value of the property is the same as the property of the control that the is assigned to. 和 是互斥的，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则将另一个设置为无效值并将其忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果设置了 属性，则 属性会自动设置为-1。If you set the property, the property is automatically set to -1. 或者，如果设置了 属性，则会 自动将设置为空字符串 ( "" ) 。Alternatively, if you set the property, the is automatically set to an empty string (""). ( .NET 5.0 和更高) 版本如果关联的 属性值更改为 `null` ，则 属性将返回其默认值-1。(.NET 5.0 and later) If the associated property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，分配的 值在内部保留，并在另一个 对象分配给属性时使用 。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果分配给 该属性的新的 属性值小于或等于赋给属性的值 减一 (以将集合作为从零开始的索引) ，则该 属性值将调整为小于 属性值的值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，请考虑一个按钮控件，其 包含三个图像，其 属性设置为2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果为该 按钮分配了只包含两个图像的新，则 该值将更改为1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个控件并将 其分配给 控件，并 使用 对象填充控件。The following code example creates and assigns an to a control and fills the control with objects. 树节点是从中分配的图像 ，当树节点处于选中状态或未选定状态时显示这些图像。The tree nodes are assigned images from the that is displayed when the tree node is in a selected or unselected state. 此示例要求具有 包含的 ，以及 包含 `Customer` 每个对象的对象 `Order` 。This example requires that you have a that contains a , and an that contains `Customer` objects that each contain `Order` objects. 它还要求 `Customer` `Order` 定义和对象。It also requires that the `Customer` and `Order` objects are defined. remarks.format: ## Remarks 值是 存储在 分配给属性的中的的索引值 。The value is the index value of an stored in the assigned to the property. 和 是互斥的，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则将另一个设置为无效值并将其忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果设置了 属性，则 属性会自动设置为-1。If you set the property, the property is automatically set to -1. 或者，如果设置了 属性，则会 自动将设置为空字符串 ( "" ) 。Alternatively, if you set the property, the is automatically set to an empty string (""). ( .NET 5.0 和更高) 版本如果关联的 属性值更改为 `null` ，则 属性将返回其默认值-1。(.NET 5.0 and later) If the associated property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，分配的 值在内部保留，并在另一个 对象分配给属性时使用 。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果分配给 该属性的新的 属性值小于或等于赋给属性的值 减一 (以将集合作为从零开始的索引) ，则该 属性值将调整为小于 属性值的值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，请考虑一个按钮控件，其 包含三个图像，其 属性设置为2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果为该 按钮分配了只包含两个图像的新，则 该值将更改为1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. > [!NOTE] > 属性的默认值与 分配给的控件的属性相同 。The default value of the property is the same as the property of the control that the is assigned to. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个控件并将 其分配给 控件，并 使用 对象填充控件。The following code example creates and assigns an to a control and fills the control with objects. 树节点是从中分配的图像 ，当树节点处于选中状态或未选定状态时显示这些图像。The tree nodes are assigned images from the that is displayed when the tree node is in a selected or unselected state. 此示例要求您具有 包含的 ，以及 `Customer` 每个对象包含 `Order` 对象的。This example requires that you have a containing a , and an containing `Customer` objects that each contain `Order` objects. 它还要求 `Customer` `Order` 定义和对象。It also requires that the `Customer` and `Order` objects are defined. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可显示的最大字符数 为259。The maximum number of characters that a can display is 259. 如果为 此属性分配了超过259个字符的，则只显示前259个字符。If a that has more than 259 characters is assigned to this property, only the first 259 characters are displayed. 如果 父的属性 设置为，则用户无法设置此属性 `false` 。This property cannot be set by the user if the property of the parent is set to `false`. 显式设置此属性的替代方法是通过使用 具有表示属性的字符串参数的构造函数之一来创建树节点 。The alternative to explicitly setting this property is to create the tree node by using one of the constructors that has a string parameter that represents the property. 如果显示图像，则会在图像旁显示标签 。The label is displayed next to the image, if one is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个根树节点来分配子树节点。The following code example creates a root tree node to assign child tree nodes to. 中每个对象的子树节点 `Customer` 将添加到根树节点以及分配给该对象的每个对象的子树节点 `Order` `Customer` 。A child tree node for each `Customer` object in an is added to the root tree node as well as a child tree node for each `Order` object assigned to the `Customer` object. `Customer`对象被分配给 属性，表示对象的树节点 `Customer` 与文本一起显示 。The `Customer` object is assigned to the property, and the tree nodes representing `Customer` objects are displayed with text. 此示例需要 `Customer` 定义一个和 `Order` 对象、一个 上的控件和一个 `customerArray` 包含对象的 `Customer` 。This example requires that you have a `Customer` and `Order` object defined, a control on a , and an named `customerArray` that contains `Customer` objects. summary.span: 将树节点切换为展开或折叠状态。

span.span: Toggles the tree node to either the expanded or collapsed state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 树节点切换到与其当前状态相对的状态（展开或折叠）。The tree node is toggled to the state opposite its current state, either expanded or collapsed. > [!NOTE] > 的状态 是持久的。The state of a is persisted. 例如，如果之前未折叠子节点的下一级别，则在 调用方法时，子节点将显示在其先前展开的状态中。For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在用户 右键单击鼠标并在用户单击鼠标滚轮时将其从展开状态切换到折叠，从而删除。The following code example removes a when the user right-clicks the mouse over it and toggles it from expanded to collapsed when the user clicks the mouse wheel over it. 此示例要求具有 具有 控件的。This example requires that you have a with a control on it. 应有两个或多个根树节点，每个节点至少具有一个子节点。The should have two or more root tree nodes, each having at least one child node.
